articles.content:
Ministry of New and Renewable Energy 
Allocation for fertilizer sector increased from 5.5 lakh tonnes per annum to 7.5 lakh tonnes per annum of Green Ammonia.
Posted On:
 22 JUN 2024 1:08PM by PIB… [+2073 chars]
